body.name: Biglory Doorbell Camera with Ring Chime, Video Doorbell Wireless, 2-Way Audio, AI Human Detection, Easy Installation, Live Image, Home Security, Outdoor/Indoor Surveillance, 2.4GHz WiFi
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 13 hrs 15 mins
features: [Free Doorbell Chime]: Included in your package is a versatile doorbell chime. Install it anywhere - living room, kitchen, or balcony - to get timely notifications. Pair multiple chimes with a single doorbell for added flexibility.

[Superior Night Vision & Crystal-Clear Wide View]: Six integrated IR lights coupled with a smart sensor guarantee crisp recording even in low-light, ensuring non-stop safety. Experience sharp, wide-angle live videos, capturing every detail vividly.
[Interactive 2-Way Talk]: Have real-time bilateral conversations with visitors, wherever you are. Engage in live two-sided chats with your guests, from any location.

[AI-Powered Human Detection & Prompt Motion Notifications]: Experience precision with our AI tech that distinctly recognizes human movement, disregarding distractions like moving vehicles or rustling leaves. Receive instant mobile notifications upon motion detection, keeping you attuned to front-door activities.

[Cloud Storage]: Enjoy peace of mind with AES-128 encrypted cloud storage. Opt for our subscription (available separately) to elevate your experience. Begin with our complimentary 30-day trial for uninterrupted recording and sharing.

How long does the doorbell camera work on one full battery? On average, the doorbell camera's battery endures 1 to 3 months on one charge, but frequent recording and consistent Live View usage can drain it more quickly, requiring sooner charging. Does the doorbell camera provide cloud storage for its video recordings? To save videos, you'll need to subscribe to a cloud service, starting with a free trial. During this period, you won't be charged, and the subscription will automatically begin post-trial unless you decide to cancel it without cost if unsatisfied. Does the doorbell camera support connection to 5GHz wireless networks? This doorbell camera is designed to be used with 2.4GHz Wi-Fi only. If you have a dual-band router, differentiate the networks by name and attach the camera to the 2.4GHz network. How many users can simultaneously access the doorbell camera's live feed? The primary user can share the device with eight others. While three people can view the video feed at once, only one person can use the intercom. How do I set human detection to ensure longer battery life for my doorbell camera? Frequent motion in your camera's view, like kids playing, can wear out the battery. Set human detection to high accuracy to reduce this and conserve power.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good little camera
reviews.reviewText: It's a nice little camera. It has a good battery life and was easy to mount to our door frame. We can have more than one person signed which is really helpful. Our complaints are that has a tendency to sign us out of the app or will disconnect from the internet. We have to sign back in in order to get notifications. It still works, it just won't notify us. It also has a few moments lag for notifying when someone is at our door. If they ring the doorbell we hear it. If not we don't always get notified right away. Other than that we like it.
